categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Llanic system was a star system located in the Karthakk sector of the Outer Rim Territories and contained the planet of Llanic.

A battle occurred inthe system during the Cold War. The Sith Empire constructed a secret space station, where was developed a new biological weapon, the Ziroxin-12. However the Republic discovered the Sith's plans and sent the Coruscant Aegis to spearhead assault on the station.
